S

SchedulingManager - Class in mediator
A class implementing methods from interface SchedulingManagerModel
SchedulingManager() - Constructor for class mediator.SchedulingManager
 
SchedulingManagerModel - Interface in mediator
An interface with methods that allow user to perform actions on model classes within GUI
Session - Class in model
A class representing session in the system (basically foundation of whole system)
Session(Date, Room, TimeSlot, StudentClass, Course) - Constructor for class model.Session
5-argument constructor initializing all instance variables
Session(Date, StudentClass, Course) - Constructor for class model.Session
3-arguments constructor initializing room and time slot to null (they can be set later with setters)
SessionDataViewController - Class in view
A class that is controller for SessionDataView window in GUI
SessionDataViewController() - Constructor for class view.SessionDataViewController
Empty constructor, its purpose is taken over by init method
SessionHolder - Class in mediator
A class which only purpose is to keep data of one Session object between windows in GUI.
SessionList - Class in model
A class representing list of all sessions in the system
SessionList() - Constructor for class model.SessionList
0-argument constructing initializing new ArrayList of sessions
SessionListViewModel - Class in view
A class responsible for managing content of the table in SessionDataView window in GUI
SessionListViewModel(SchedulingManagerModel) - Constructor for class view.SessionListViewModel
Constructor initializing new list which will contain all the sessions in the system
SessionViewModel - Class in view
A class responsible for managing content of one row in the table in SessionDataView window in GUI
SessionViewModel(Session) - Constructor for class view.SessionViewModel
Constructor initializing properties based on the session passed as parameter
set(int, int, int) - Method in class model.Date
Set method used in constructor to set all instance variables and validate the parameters
setDate(Date) - Method in class model.Session
Setter for date
setMergedRoom(String) - Method in class model.Room
Setter for mergedRoomName
setReservation(Date, TimeSlot) - Method in class model.Room
Method adding new reservation of the room at particular date and timeslot by adding them to corresponding ArrayLists at the same indexes
setRoom(Room) - Method in class model.Session
Setter for a room
setSession(Session) - Method in class mediator.SessionHolder
Method setting data of which object will the SessionHolder class keep
setStudent(Student) - Method in class mediator.StudentHolder
Method setting data of which object will the StudentHolder class keep
setTeacher(Teacher) - Method in class mediator.TeacherHolder
Method setting data of which object will the TeacherHolder class keep
setTeacher(Teacher) - Method in class model.Course
Setter for teacher
setTimeSlot(TimeSlot) - Method in class mediator.TimeSlotHolder
Method setting data of which object will the TimeSlotHolder class keep
setTimeSlot(TimeSlot) - Method in class model.Session
Setter for time slot
start(Stage) - Method in class MyApplication
 
start(Stage) - Method in class view.ViewHandler
Method initializing the stage and opening the first scene in GUI
START_TIMES - Static variable in class model.TimeSlot
 
stepForward(int) - Method in class model.Date
Incrementing the date by days days
stepForwardOneDay() - Method in class model.Date
Incrementing the date by one day
Student - Class in model
A class representing student (inherits from Person class)
Student(String, String, int, String) - Constructor for class model.Student
4-arguments constructor calling first superclass constructor
studentClass - Variable in class model.Session
 
StudentClass - Class in model
A class representing class of students in the system
StudentClass(int, String) - Constructor for class model.StudentClass
2-arguments constructor
StudentDataViewController - Class in view
A class that is controller for StudentDataView window in GUI
StudentDataViewController() - Constructor for class view.StudentDataViewController
Empty constructor, its purpose is taken over by init method
StudentHolder - Class in mediator
A class which only purpose is to keep data of one Student object between windows in GUI.
StudentList - Class in model
A class representing list of all students in system
StudentList() - Constructor for class model.StudentList
0-arguments constructor initializing new ArrayList of students
StudentListViewModel - Class in view
A class responsible for managing content of the table in StudentDataView window in GUI
StudentListViewModel(SchedulingManagerModel) - Constructor for class view.StudentListViewModel
Constructor initializing new list which will contain all the students in the system
StudentToCourseViewController - Class in view
A class that is controller for StudentToCourseView window in GUI
StudentToCourseViewController() - Constructor for class view.StudentToCourseViewController
Empty constructor, its purpose is taken over by init method
StudentViewModel - Class in view
A class responsible for managing content of one row in the table in StudentDataView window in GUI
StudentViewModel(Student) - Constructor for class view.StudentViewModel
Constructor initializing properties based on the student passed as parameter
